issues.message:
[Error] mat-icon used as interactive without accessible label. Screen readers cannot announce icon-only buttons
  How to fix:
    - Add aria-label to parent button
    - Add visually-hidden text
    - Add aria-hidden="true" if purely decorative
  WCAG 4.1.2: Name, Role, Value | See: https://material.angular.io/components/icon/overview#accessibility
  Found: <mat-icon>close</mat-icon>

[Error] mat-icon used as interactive without accessible label. Screen readers cannot announce icon-only buttons
  How to fix:
    - Add aria-label to parent button
    - Add visually-hidden text
    - Add aria-hidden="true" if purely decorative
  WCAG 4.1.2: Name, Role, Value | See: https://material.angular.io/components/icon/overview#accessibility
  Found: <mat-icon class="no-components-icon">web</mat-icon>

[Error] mat-icon used as interactive without accessible label. Screen readers cannot announce icon-only buttons
  How to fix:
    - Add aria-label to parent button
    - Add visually-hidden text
    - Add aria-hidden="true" if purely decorative
  WCAG 4.1.2: Name, Role, Value | See: https://material.angular.io/components/icon/overview#accessibility
  Found: <mat-icon>edit</mat-icon>

[Error] mat-progress-bar/spinner missing accessible label. Screen readers cannot identify what is loading
  How to fix:
    - Add aria-label="Loading description"
    - Add aria-labelledby referencing status text
  WCAG 4.1.2: Name, Role, Value | See: https://material.angular.io/components/progress-bar/overview#accessibility
  Found: <mat-spinner diameter="60">

[Error] mat-progress-bar/spinner missing accessible label. Screen readers cannot identify what is loading
  How to fix:
    - Add aria-label="Loading description"
    - Add aria-labelledby referencing status text
  WCAG 4.1.2: Name, Role, Value | See: https://material.angular.io/components/progress-bar/overview#accessibility
  Found: <mat-spinner diameter="60">

[Warning] Animation without prefers-reduced-motion support. Animations can cause vestibular disorders and motion sickness
  How to fix:
    - Add @media (prefers-reduced-motion: reduce) query
    - Disable or reduce animation when preference is set
  WCAG 2.3.3: Animation from Interactions
  Found: File uses animations and transitions without properly disabling them in prefers-reduced-motion: redu...
